TerrariaCraftingTableBlock:0.Description: You can directly craft items on this table without placing ingredients in the slots. The behavior is similar to the game Terraria. The ingredients are taken from your inventory and chests connected to the Terraria Crafting Table. Chests further away can be connected to the Terraria Crafting Table through other chests. The crafting results will be placed into the player's inventory.
TerrariaCraftingTableBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Make a Terraria crafting table from crafting tables

SubsystemTerrariaCraftingTableBlockBehav.3: Failed. Perhaps due to lack of ingredients
